item.description: Pool time!! During this meet up I will pull out the pools so remember to bring your bathing suits! Again, the yard is completely fenced in so your pups can round around secure & safe. If for some reason there is bad wheather we will hold the meet up in our indoor playroom. Hope to see everyone there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at the front desk!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Pool Party Meetup!
